name: Pit Defenders
description:
Pit Defenders is my submission to Brackey's February 2021 game jam. The theme was "Stronger together". 

It's not a long game, or a difficult one. This was by design - the idea was for someone to be able to complete it in one sitting and move on to the next game.

The game was designed with a controller in mind, but keyboard is supported. I hope you like it! Let me know what you think! :)
